lead_paragraph: Apps will allow users to peek at their balance and recent activity, but not to pay bills or make deposits.

headline.print_headline: Doing Banking on Apple Watch Will Be Limited, for Now
headline.main: Banking on Apple Watch Will Be Limited, for Now

snippet: Apps will allow users to peek at their balance and recent activity, but not to pay bills or make deposits.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column examines app offerings by banks for newly released Apple Watch; answers questions for those considering whether such apps would be useful.
